summary: IBM, or International Business Machines, is an American tech company known as "Big Blue." Founded in 1911, it became a leader in computer technology, especially with its mainframe systems in the 1960s and 1970s. IBM has many inventions to its name, like ATMs, floppy disks, and barcodes. It holds the record for most U.S. patents and has a strong focus on research. IBM is also famous for its powerful supercomputers and has won many awards for its technological advancements. Today, it is still a major player in the tech industry, offering various computer services and software.
title: IBM
